jobAnalysis.safetySensitiveRationale: Position involves operating heavy machinery and handling hazardous materials
jobAnalysis.equipmentOperationRationale: Role requires operation of forklifts and conveyor systems
jobAnalysis.currentJobRelevanceRationale: Current warehouse experience directly transfers to this logistics role

pros.description: Strong safety record with hazmat experience
pros.evidence: 5 years CDL with hazmat endorsement, zero accidents reported
Operated Class A vehicles and warehouse equipment for 5+ years

cons.evidence: Average 1.8 years per employer over last 5 years
2.4 month gap between last two positions

assessment.keyRisk: Job stability - pattern of shorter tenures may indicate retention risk

questions: Can you describe your experience handling hazardous materials?
What safety protocols do you follow when transporting hazmat?
I notice you've changed jobs several times recently. What factors are important to you in finding a long-term position?
What would make you want to stay with an employer for multiple years?
What keeps you motivated and engaged in a role long-term?
How do you handle challenges or conflicts in the workplace?
